abstrac: One Stop Solution For Business's Digital Transformation
bio:
eComStreet has over 11 years of experience in developing mobile-friendly, interactive websites and apps which are known for their alluring designs as well as their innovative qualities. 

We are a one point solution for any business’s digital transformation. We are dedicated towards delivering solutions using the latest technologies and giving digital needs an existence. 

We use latest technologies such as PHP, Figma,React js, HTML, CSS, Angular,  Open Source Solutions (Magento, WordPress, Drupal, OpenCart, Shopify, etc.), and leading popular frameworks such as Laravel, CakePHP, Zend, CodeIgniter, etc. We also develop applications for iPhone, Android, Tablets (both native applications as well as cross platform technologies such as Xamarin, Flutter, ReactNative) and Game Development using Unity Game Engine.

eComStreet is the partner of choice for many of the world’s leading enterprises, SEMs and technology challengers. We help businesses elevate their value through custom software development, product design, QA and consultancy services.

To fulfill our vision & mission we have been providing quality service and support for more than 11 years. We have worked on over 1800 projects and extend end-to-end IT enabled solutions and services to a broad spectrum of industry verticals ranging from Medical, Law, Fitness, Information & Technology, Real Estate, Finance, Hospitality, Food, Interior Designing etc.

We give the best outcome with the ever evolving technology experiences. Every experience gained by the past projects makes our team work harder and smarter to bring innovative and creative strategies in further works. 

We are one point solution for your business !
Let's collaborate & grow in this digital world together !

Thank You!

As an offshore development company, we recognize the need for our employees to have superior communication skills which help them work in close collaboration with our clients across the global.

We understand the importance of communication & project management, so we have team members who are capable of handling any small or complex project and we recognize the need of our team members to be proficient with communication. Our expert professionals are always available to support our team members which eventually helps them to deliver the solutions / results accurately. 

We follow a transparent development approach that keeps our clients updated on the progress on a regular basis to ensure that the progress is in line with the expectations of the clients. We assign experienced resources with superior speaking/writing skills who communicate with our clients on a regular basis via Emails, the Guru message board, Skype, Telephone, Zoom etc

Depending on the nature and type of project we offer work on Fixed Cost, and Hourly agreed payment term.

I have been working as a professional Web Developer who has long experience for 5+ years.

I have already worked in such industries as:

This stack lets to make website and mobile app development with frontend development alongside with backend development.

In my work of website & mobile app development I always go fully Agile. I am using Trello for project management, but will be good to work with suggested by you Asana or Jira.
I have great expertise in using Laravel for backend and Vue.js for frontend or React.js as a second option.
In some projects will be better to use Django or Node.JS on backend.

abstrac: Electrical Engineer: PCB Design & Firmware Programming & Product Design
bio:
As a professional electronic and electrical engineer with over 10 years of experience, I have extensive experience in developing many kinds of electronic devices:

HARDWARE DEVELOPMENT
- FPGA, DSP, CPLD PCB design and Firmware programming
- Accelerometer, aspiration, ECG, EEG, Air quality, Doppler sensor, peripheral circuit and PCB design
- Flexible PCB inlay design
- Up to 32 layers PCB design and signal integrity analysis
- Rapid prototyping and shipping the prototypes to anywhere
- RF Antenna/Front end, filter design. Microstrip/Micro wave circuit analysis and design
- High frequency circuit analysis and design – UHF/HF analog circuit design, High frequency digital circuit design such as DDR3, eMMC, Flash memory, 1 Gbps Ethernet circuit design.
- Video/Audio streaming circuit

MICROCONTROLLER
- Standalone RF module such as Nordic series (NRF52xxx), WiFi(ATSAM25W), BLE, Zigbee, Xbee (CC3000, CC3100, RN131, RN171, Xbee, Xbee Pro, nRF24L01)
- LoRaWAN module: RAK811, RAK8833
- IMU, Accelerometer, Air quality sensors
- ARM Cortex Mxx, STM32F, ATSAME70, AT91SAM, TM4C, Apollo MCUs
- AVR8 & 16bit: ATmega328, ATmega1280, ATmega2560, ATtiny43U, ATtiny85, ATmega32U4
- PIC: PIC16FXX, PIC18FXX, PIC24FXX, PIC32FXX
- MSP: MSP430Gxxxx, MSP430Fxxxx, MSP430FRxxx
- Raspberry Pi 3 and 4
- Arduino series: Arduino UNO, Mega, Leonardo, Pro, mini, YUN, ESP8266, ESP32, MKR100

Availability: More than 40 hours per week

I prefer to get paid through guru platform here.
I am open to communicate at skype, guru chatting, zoom meeting, google meeting, and phone call.

abstrac: Writing is not a task but a responsibility.
bio: You will receive quality content through my specialized mix of experience in academic and SEO content writing, particularly because of my postgraduate-level knowledge in Applied Linguistics and professional experience in blog writing among others. From my standpoint, passion is not enough to pursue any career in writing; instead, what gets one going in this industry is practice, commitment, and self-discipline. Writing is all about knowing how and where to look for relevant information, especially when they become elusive, as well as transforming them into the best possible words that the masses can healthily consume.

I am available from Mondays through Fridays standard working hours UTC+8:00. As I offer non-voice services, written communication through emails (or another direct messaging platform at your convenience) would be preferred.

bio:
I'm SugarCRM/SuiteCRM expert with more than 8 years of hands on experience in Sugar/SuiteCRM Management, developing, customizing and managing SugarCRM/SuiteCRM projects of different magnitudes. Having experience in Custom Modules, Views, Reports, Work Flow and Integration using REST and SOAP API's. Done Integration with Google Calendar,Google Contacts, Email Archiving, Mailchimp, Interspire, SendGrid, QuickBooks, Xero and Neteffekt. I am working since SugarCRM CE 5.3 till 6.5.10 and SuiteCRM. I have done a lot of Migration of Sugar and SuiteCRM instances, My experience contain all tasks related to Module builder, Package creation, customization, Integrations, Custom module Installation and Configuration, Customization of Custom Modules.

During the past 8+ years, I have been developing upgrade safe solutions for SuiteCRM and SugarCRM on all editions: Community, Professional, Enterprise, Ultimate.

**Other Technical Skills I have:** 

HTML, PHP, Javascript,Jquery, SugarCRM, SuiteCRM. WordPress, Data Bases using MySQL and SQL, Relational Data Bases. C#, Dot NET, XML. Java. JMS, Web Services. Installation and Deployment of Eucalyptus Cloud.

I am working on hourly bases 40 to 50 hours a week. My hourly rate is $17.99 per hour, Payment will be weekly. I am available on skype almost 18 to 20 hours a day.. One may also send me an email if I am not online on skype.

bio:
I am a highly motivated and skilled full-stack developer, passionate about building over 7+ years.

My skill set allows me to see task from different angles and choose best solution.

I like to be on the bleeding edge technology, but I can also use more classic ways to solve problem depending on client's preferences and timing.

My primary personal skill is to apply my best efforts to find appropriate solution to solve client's problem. And my wide range professional knowledge is the key to achieve the goal.

I never cease to learn new things. I always move on.

Hi!

Thank you very much for considering 99Graphics Design team for the design and development of your dream website(s), our agency consists of young and talented web developers with great passion to satisfy your needs and desires.

For one, We're a team of very passionate developers with vast experience in:

• Website wire-frame design
• UI/UX Design
• Landing page design
• Responsive mobile app design
• PSD to HTML
• Web design and development
• WordPress installation and setup
• E-commerce store development
• Webflow Development
• PHP development
• Laravel development

With all these skills, we can help you develop a platform that is both responsive and easy to navigate.
All our works are specially made responsive and are search engine optimized, this way visitors’ bounce rate from your website will be reduced and your website will become more visible on search engines.

For this reason, We do not make use of any automated tools to write your web codes; instead, we write everything manually from scratch. This way we can develop a super responsive and elegantly professional website for you and as well as include helpful comments with the code. With our comments other developers or yourself can easily modify the structure when the need arises in the future.

Best Regards,
Avijit
99Graphics Design

bio:
Need help setting up your Sales Funnel Marketing Automation?

I help direct-to-consumer eCommerce brands increase sales by improving their Marketing funnels, Marketing integration and automation, Storytelling, and Email Marketing. My mission is to help great companies that do good things to win in the market so that everyone will eventually be better off.

Consultant for eCommerce, I will help you solve any problems and dilemmas and to reach your FIRST sale easily and expand your business. You need a proven process, not a theoretical analysis. In a few steps, I will improve your Business.

eCommerce Work Flow:

1. Shopify and WordPress - WooCommerce Website Development 

2. Shopify, WordPress WooCommerce Integrations, and Problem-solving.

3. SEO optimization Website. (Necessary for free traffic at Google and advertising on Google ads and shopping)

4. Opening and linking to the Facebook page, Facebook pixel, Instagram, Instagram Shoppable Shop, Youtube, Google Analytics, Google ads, and Google Shopping. (everything you need for efficient digital marketing)

5. Testing and Launching Facebook and Instagram Paid Ads, Instagram Shoppable Posts, Google ads, Google Shopping, and Google retargeting.

6. Video editing for Facebook ads, Instagram ads, and Youtube

7. Klaviyo MASTER Partner or ActiveCampaign Automate Email Marketing:

✅  Welcome series, Abandoned cart emails, VIP vs. Non-VIP, Promotions, Anniversary and Birthday flow, Customer Winback, Post-Purchase Followup - Order Count Split, Product Review, according to the rules of Marketing Persuasion.

✅ Lead Generation, Email Marketing Strategy, Email Campaign Setup Marketing, Automation Messenger, Marketing Strategy, Audience Segmentation & Targeting, Email Technical Support, Automation Content.

✅ Sales funnel Marketing Automation - CRM software, Facebook custom audiences ads & Automated Email Campaigns that work together to improve performance.

abstrac: Full-stack software developer - Bringing intelligence to Machines!
bio:
Awais is a highly experienced full stack software developer with a decade of expertise in Robotics, AI, Machine Learning, and embedded systems. He has exceptional programming skills in the Python ecosystem for developing desktop and web applications, and specializes in creating custom solutions that learn from data, automate routine tasks and improve over time.

With an MS degree in Mechatronics Engineering, Awais has a strong academic background and research experience, which is reflected in his 2 publications in Deep Learning and 1 patent. He is committed to delivering high-quality results on time and within budget, and has experience managing projects and leading teams of up to 10 individuals.

He has exceptional programming skills in several programming languages, including Python, Javascript, C++, C#, HTML, and CSS. Awais is proficient in using frameworks such as PyQt, Flask, Django, ReactJS, tensorflow, scikit learn, and pandas to develop sophisticated hardware and software systems. Additinally, he is proficient in API development and API integration, allowing him to create custom solutions that seamlessly integrate with other software applications. 

If you're looking for a full stack software developer with a broad range of technical skills, Awais is the right choice.

I am available to work flexible hours to accommodate your business needs, and I'm committed to delivering high-quality results within the agreed-upon timeframe. My payment terms are negotiable and depend on the specific scope of the project. I value clear and timely communication, and I am happy to provide regular updates and collaborate with you throughout the development process.
